Uses of Interface
eu.ehri.project.models.PermissionGrant

  • Packages that use PermissionGrant 
    Package Description
    eu.ehri.project.acl
    Classes pertaining directly to the access-control and permission system.
    eu.ehri.project.models.base
    The interfaces in this package specify the required and allowable properties of classes of entities, so that entities can be validated.
    eu.ehri.project.views
    Classes that provide data access "views" on the graph that incorporate the permission and access-control systems.
